price: ߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߕߎ߬ߢߊ ߓߘߊ߫ ߣߊ߬ ߞߊ߬ߙߏ߲ ߕߍ߫ ߖߎ߬ߕߍ߰ ߟߴߏ߬ ߞߐ߫ ߊ߬ ߕߍ߫ ߡߊߛߊ߬ߦߌ߬
arabic: قُلۡ جَآءَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَمَا يُبۡدِئُ ٱلۡبَٰطِلُ وَمَا يُعِيدُ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qul jāa al-ḥaqu wamā yub'di-u al-bāṭilu wamā yuʿīdu
